channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Rational Engineering Lifecycle Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Rational Engineering Lifecycle Manager

item.title: CVE-2021-20447|2024-08-03T17:37:24.246Z -- ibm -- rational%20engineering%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation Products are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 196623.
